name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remail - ChatGPT Sidebar + GPT-4o, Claude 3.5, Gemini 1.5 & AI Prompts Hub

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your AI assistant powered by GPT-4, Claude 3.5, Gemini 1.5, and advanced AI tools to read, write, translate, and create images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remail is your AI copilot sidebar wherever you need. From smart emails to endless web help, Remail goes with you - wherever you browse online.

🔥 Remail is your all-in-one AI assistant ChatGPT Sidebar + GPT-4o, Claude, Gemini & many more AI Tools.

Hit Cmd/Ctrl + M, and you're in with it.

We offer assistance in various tasks including email writing, reading, writing, translating, drawing, and many more.

🟢 The Key Features: 🟢

1️⃣   Chat with multiple AI models

  ✅ Chat and Compare best AI models including GPT-4o, GPT-o1 mini, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Gemini 1.5 Pro, Llama 3.1 405B, Mistral Large, Perplexity and more all in one place.
  ✅ Real-Time: obtain current real-time internet information.
  ✅ Mixture AI: Mixture AI synthesizes the outputs from ChatGPT-4o, Gemini 1.5 Pro, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, and Llama 3.1 into one complete answer.

2️⃣ AI Email

  ✅ Compose and reply to emails 10x faster. In Gmail, we suggest reply options based on email content, allowing click-based responses without typing.
  ✅ Add your website, documents and FAQs to build a knowledge base and train AI to take them into account to generate email based on them.

3️⃣ AI Read

  ✅ ChatPDF: upload and chat with PDF to better understand the content.
  ✅ Chat With Image: upload an image or take a screenshot and ask questions from it.
  ✅ YouTube Summary: get summaries without watching entire videos.
 
4️⃣ AI Write

  ✅ Write agent: provide a topic, and we'll auto-draft outlines with expanded content and references.
  ✅ Write agent: speedup your writing a topic with an editor that adapts to your tone, and we'll auto-draft outlines with expanded content.
  ✅ Ideal for crafting blog entries, scripts, and social media posts.

5️⃣  AI Art 

  ✅ Supported by stated of the art AI image generation models (e.g Flux AI, Leonardo AI, and more), convert your words into stunning images in seconds!

6️⃣  Create contents for Social Media

  ✅ Create viral posts and carousels in no time!
  ✅ Schedule your posts in one click

7️⃣ AI Custom Prompts 🪄

  ✅ Create your own custom AI prompts and organize them in quick menu.
  ✅ Use carefully curated prompts library to communicate with ChatGPT and other AI Models more effectively.
  ✅ Prompt Library: Create and save custom prompts for reuse, anytime you need them.


8️⃣ AI Toolkit 🛠️

  ✅ Cross-Platform: Remail is not just for Chrome. We've got apps for iOS, Android, Windows, and Mac, plus extensions for Edge and Safari. One account, access everywhere.
  ✅ BYO API Key: Got an OpenAI API Key? Plug it into Remail and run on your own tokens.


💻 How to use:
🔹Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to the toolbar.
🔹Log in to your account.
🔹Press Cmd/Ctrl+M to wake up Monica.
🔹Start working with AI!

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:
📌 Can I try Remail for free?
- Yes. We provide 7 days free trial.

📌 Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
- No, you do not need to have a ChatGPT account to use this extension. You can create a free account.

📌 ChatGPT is banned in my country. Does it work in my country?
- Yes. Our extension works in all countries.

📪 Contact us:
Any questions or suggestions? Please contact us at  💌 contact@remail.ai

Try it now and experience the powerful features of All-in-one AI sidebar assistants powered by ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Llama, and more!
